## ğŸ› ï¸ Installation

Clone the repository:
```bash
git clone https://github.com/padm3-sh/onefinity.git
cd onefinity
```

Install dependencies with [Poetry](https://python-poetry.org/):
```bash
poetry install
```

## â–¶ï¸ How to Play

